divs: Sighting Detailslast night around between 730 and 8 me and a friend were walking and we noticed a white orb in the sky we attempted to take a pic but i toke off right as i toke the pic and it looked kinda weird then later when i got dark we saw another orb it was flashing red and white it looked like it was getting closer so we went inside the scariest thing is that i have now seen 3 ufos this month
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There was one other sighting in Oklahoma City on or around April 4th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: a white orb followed by white with flashing red orb 2 hrs later
